trans-unit.source: Represents information about a <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer" /> or <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: Representa información sobre una instancia de <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer" /> o de <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine" />.

trans-unit.source: You can obtain identifying information for an initialized recognition engine using <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RecognizerInfo%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> for a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer> object or <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizerInfo%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> for a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> object.
trans-unit.target: Puede obtener información de identificación de un motor de reconocimiento inicializado con <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RecognizerInfo%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> para un <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer> objeto o <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizerInfo%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> para un <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> objeto.

trans-unit.source: The information returned in instances of <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerInfo> obtained from a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer> is determined by the settings in the **Speech Properties** member of the **Control Panel**.
trans-unit.target: Devuelve la información en las instancias de <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerInfo> obtenido de un <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer> viene determinado por la configuración en el **propiedades de voz** miembro de la **el Panel de Control**.

trans-unit.source: You can use instances of <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerInfo> to construct a specific configuration of <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> using the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.%23ctor%28System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerInfo%29> constructor.
trans-unit.target: Puede usar instancias de <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerInfo> para crear una configuración específica de <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> mediante el <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.%23ctor%28System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerInfo%29> constructor.

trans-unit.source: The static method <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.InstalledRecognizers%2A> returns a list of all available <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> configurations as <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerInfo> instances.
trans-unit.target: El método estático <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.InstalledRecognizers%2A> devuelve una lista de todos los disponibles <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> configuraciones como <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerInfo> instancias.

trans-unit.source: The following example validates a given <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> and identifier string against the permitted <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> configurations, expressed as a list of <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerInfo> objects.
trans-unit.target: El siguiente ejemplo se valida un determinado <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> y cadena de identificador en el permitido <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> configuraciones, expresadas como una lista de <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerInfo> objetos.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> and identifier string are valid, the example creates a new instance of <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> using the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerInfo> instance as an argument.
trans-unit.target: Si el <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> y cadena de identificador son válidos, en el ejemplo se crea una nueva instancia de <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> mediante el <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerInfo> instancia como un argumento.

trans-unit.source: Gets additional information about a <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer" /> or <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene la información adicional sobre una instancia de <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer" /> o de <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine" />.

trans-unit.source: Returns an instance of <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary`2" /> containing information about the configuration of a <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer" /> or <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Devuelve una instancia de <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary`2" /> que contiene información sobre la configuración de un objeto <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer" /> o <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine" />.

trans-unit.source: The example below implements a button click which displays all the information in a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerInfo> object in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox>.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo siguiente implementa un clic de botón que muestra toda la información en un <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerInfo> objeto en un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox>.

trans-unit.source: The key/value pairs contained in the <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary%602> instance returned by <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerInfo.AdditionalInfo%2A> are concatenated into a text table.
trans-unit.target: Los pares de clave/valor incluidos en la <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary%602> instancia devuelta por <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerInfo.AdditionalInfo%2A> se concatenan en una tabla de texto.

trans-unit.source: Gets the culture supported by a <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer" /> or <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene la referencia cultural admitida por una instancia de <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer" /> o de <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine" />.

trans-unit.source: Returns information about the culture supported by a given <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer" /> or <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: Devuelve información sobre la referencia cultural admitida por una instancia de <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer" /> o <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine" /> determinada.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object can include the name of the culture, the associated language, the country/region, the calendar used, and how to format dates and sort strings.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> objeto puede incluir el nombre de la referencia cultural, el idioma asociado, el país o región, el calendario utilizado y cómo dar formato a fechas y ordenar cadenas.

trans-unit.source: The following example implements a button click that displays all the information in a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerInfo> instance.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo siguiente se implementa un clic de botón que muestra toda la información en un <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerInfo> instancia.

trans-unit.source: The example uses the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerInfo.Culture%2A> property to obtain the identifying string for the <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> used by the recognition engine configuration.
trans-unit.target: El ejemplo se utiliza la <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerInfo.Culture%2A> deberá obtener la identificación de la propiedad de cadena para el <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> utilizado por la configuración del motor de reconocimiento.

trans-unit.source: Gets the description of a <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer" /> or <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene la descripción de una instancia <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer" /> o <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine" />.

trans-unit.source: Returns a <see langword="string" /> that describes the configuration for a specific <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer" /> or <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: Devuelve una <see langword="string" /> que describe la configuración de una instancia de <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer" /> o <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine" /> específica.

trans-unit.source: The following example below implements a button click that displays all the information in a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerInfo> instance.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo siguiente implementa un clic de botón que muestra toda la información en un <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerInfo> instancia.

trans-unit.source: The example uses the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerInfo.Description%2A> property to obtain the description of a speech recognition engine configuration, and then displays it in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox>.
trans-unit.target: El ejemplo se utiliza la <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerInfo.Description%2A> propiedad para obtener la descripción de una configuración de motor de reconocimiento de voz y, a continuación, lo muestra en un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox>.

trans-unit.source: Disposes the <c>RecognizerInfo</c> object.
trans-unit.target: Desecha el objeto <c>RecognizerInfo</c>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the identifier of a <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer" /> or <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene el identificador de una instancia <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer" /> o <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine" />.

trans-unit.source: Returns the identifier for a specific <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer" /> or <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: Devuelve el identificador de una instancia de <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer" /> o <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine" /> específica.

trans-unit.source: The identifier returned by the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerInfo.Id%2A> property is the same as the token name of the recognition engine in the Windows registry.
trans-unit.target: El identificador devuelto por la <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerInfo.Id%2A> propiedad es el mismo que el nombre del token del motor de reconocimiento en el registro de Windows.

trans-unit.source: The following example implements a button click that displays all the information in a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerInfo> instance.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo siguiente se implementa un clic de botón que muestra toda la información en un <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerInfo> instancia.

trans-unit.source: The example uses the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerInfo.Id%2A> property to obtain the identifier string of a recognition engine configuration, and then displays it in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox>.
trans-unit.target: El ejemplo se utiliza la <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerInfo.Id%2A> propiedad que se va a obtener la cadena de identificador de una configuración del motor de reconocimiento y, a continuación, lo muestra en un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the friendly name of a <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer" /> or <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene el nombre descriptivo de una instancia <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer" /> o <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine" />.

trans-unit.source: Returns the friendly name for a specific <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer" /> or <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: Devuelve el nombre descriptivo para una instancia específica de <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer" /> o <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine" />.

trans-unit.source: The following example implements a button click that displays all the information in a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerInfo> instance.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo siguiente se implementa un clic de botón que muestra toda la información en un <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerInfo> instancia.

trans-unit.source: The example uses the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerInfo.Name%2A> property to obtain the friendly name of a recognition engine configuration, and then displays it in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox>.
trans-unit.target: El ejemplo se utiliza la <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerInfo.Name%2A> propiedad que se va a obtener el nombre descriptivo de una configuración del motor de reconocimiento y, a continuación, lo muestra en un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the audio formats supported by a <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer" /> or <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene los formatos de audio admitidos por una instancia de <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer" /> o de <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine" />.

trans-unit.source: Returns a list of audio formats supported by a specific <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer" /> or <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: Devuelve una lista de formatos de audio admitidos por una instancia específica de <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer" /> o <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine" />.

trans-unit.source: The following example implements a button click that displays all the information in a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerInfo> instance.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo siguiente se implementa un clic de botón que muestra toda la información en un <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerInfo> instancia.

trans-unit.source: The example uses the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerInfo.SupportedAudioFormats%2A> property to obtain the encoding formats supported by a recognition engine configuration, and then displays it in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox>.
trans-unit.target: El ejemplo se utiliza la <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerInfo.SupportedAudioFormats%2A> propiedad para obtener los formatos de codificación admitidos por una configuración del motor de reconocimiento y, a continuación, lo muestra en un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox>.
